about_the_game:
It is a cozy puzzle game in which you search for the differences between two pictures. Restore 26 animated artworks in the public domain, such as "A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte" and "The Great Wave off Kanagawa."

The game uses copyright-free or public-domain artworks to create levels. There is currently one chapter in the game, with 26 levels, each with three difficulties.

This is a small game developed is our first indie game.

We hope you can find peace and fun in this free find-the-difference game.

Our New Game!

LauNewBee studio is developing a new Steam game "Tongue of Doge". Please wishlist to support us!

Sorry that we don’t have time to develop new levels for now. After making this game, we felt a great sense of accomplishment. Unfortunately, there was no income, so the team went to do other things. If players are interested, after the development and maintenance of "The Tongue of Doge" is over, perhaps a new chapter can be produced and sold as DLC.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes a selection of classical oil paintings that are in the public domain, some of which feature unclothed figures, such as "The Birth of Venus."

name: Art Diff

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
